text: 101 Dalmatians may mean: * The Hundred and One Dalmatians, a 1956 novel written by Dodie Smith * One Hundred and One Dalmatians, a 1961 Walt Disney animated movie * 101 Dalmatians (1996 movie), a 1996 live-action remake of the Walt Disney movie * 101 Dalmatians: The Series, a Disney television series that aired from 1997-1998 * 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure, an animated sequel to the 1961 Disney movie == Related pages == * 102 Dalmatians, a sequel to the 1996 movie released in November 2000. Category:Animated television series Category:English-language television programs
title: 101 Dalmatians
